name: Toria the One
description:
For the best experience please play this game in full-screen mode! Press the full-screen button located in the bottom right of the game screen.

Story:
Thrown into the final moments of a hard-fought, and desperate battle... You play as Toria, a young warrior who is on the verge of engraving her name heroically in history. Your allies Azmic and Odramus, have been fighting alongside you in this battle but have sustained injuries that have forced them off the battlefield. 

You are the people’s last hope. The MINOTAUR is slowly being overthrown. They’re on their last foot, and it is up to you to conquer and claim your victory. Odramus hands you his 'Entrapment Orb' that charges its energy when the holder comes close to dangerous encounters.

Game Info + Objective:
'Toria the One' is a 2D Top-down angled, Single-player game that uses the WASD and SPACE keys to move the player around the map, and the E key to interact.  You must use your agility and evasiveness to charge the Entrapment Orb in order to sustain enough power to capture the Minotaur and beat the game. Roll over chain attacks to build the orb's charge.

Controls:
WASD - Move player
E (HOLD) - Interact/Next Dialogue Message
SPACE - Roll
